abilities: {blue_puzzle}, {green_puzzle}, {red_puzzle}: If insane, ignore the first hit each round and suffer 1 brain damage instead.

Phoenix Faulds.crafting: x1 iron, x1 leather, x1 tail feathers, x1 organ

Phoenix Greaves.crafting: x1 iron, x1 leather, x1 small feathers, x1 organ

Feather Shield.crafting: x2 small feathers, x1 muculent droppings
abilities: {green_affinity}, {red_affinity}, {blue_affinity}: Reduce any suffered brain damage by 1 to a minimum of 1.

Sonic Tomahawk.crafting: x1 small feathers, x1 iron, x1 hollow wing bone
abilities: On a [Perfect Hit], make 1 additional attack roll.

Rainbow Katana.crafting: x1 bird beak, x1 rainbow droppings, x1 iron, x6 bone

abilities: On a hit, monster gains -1 movement token. Use once per showdown.

Arc Bow.crafting: x1 phoenix whisker, x1 wishbone, x1 scrap

Hollow Sword.crafting: x1 hollow wing bone, x2 bone, x2 hide
abilities: This weapon gains strength equal to the monster's damage attribute.
{red_affinity}, {green_affinity}, {blue_affinity}: As long as you have 5+ survival, gain +1 accuracy and +1 strength.
When you suffer [Knockback], you may ignore [Collision] with other survivors and reduce the movement by up to 3 spaces.
{activation} Consume: Once per showdown, add 1 {armor} to all hit locations. Gain the Priority Target token. Roll 1d10, on a 1, reduce your survival to 0.

Bloom Sphere.crafting: x1 small hand parasites, x3 bone
abilities: {green_puzzle}, {blue_puzzle}: When you are picked as a target, roll 1d10. On a 6+, the monster must pick a new target if possible.
During the Aftermath, if you died or ceased to exist, you may archive this and reset the campaign to the previous settlement phase's develop step before you departed.
x2 {blue_puzzle}, {red_puzzle}: When you depart, gain +1 insanity and +1 survival for every {blue_affinity} you have.

Blood Sheath.crafting: x5 organ, x1 hollow wing bone, x1 muculent droppings
abilities: When Rainbow Katana is directly left of this, it loses [Frail] and gains [Sharp].

Jack O' Lantern.crafting: x1 skull, x1 scrap, x1 organ
abilities: During the showdown, if you are insane when a survivor dies, gain +10 survival.
You may archive this to gain 1 broken lantern basic resource and 1 survival.
As a returning survivor, gain +1 to your intimacy rolls this settlement phase.
During the showdown, you may archive this and gain 1 permanent affinity of any color.
You may archive this to gain 1 skull basic resource and +3 insanity.
On Arrival, you may archive this and [Ambush] the monster. Limit once per campaign.
{activation} {movement} & 1 survival: Make an attack using this weapon. This attack has [Range] 3 and gains -2 accuracy and +5 speed. Ignore {reaction} WOUND for this attack. Limit once per showdown.
When you activate this, gain 1 bleeding token. X = your bleeding tokens. Z = 5 * X

Refined Lantern Sword.crafting: x1 {endeavor}, x1 lantern sword, x1 perfect bone, x5 resources from a level 3 monster.

Ashen Shears.crafting: x1 perfect hide, x3 scrap, x1 organ

Gusk Knife.crafting: x1 dense bone from Lvl 3 Gorm, x1 organ, x1 scrap OR x1 perfect bone, x1 bone resource from lvl 3 monster, x1 organ, x1 scrap

Stonesmasher.crafting: x2 large flat tooth, x1 legendary horns, x2 bone
abilities: This gains +4 luck when attacking a knocked down monster.

Xmaxe.crafting: x2 leather, x2 bone, x1 fresh acanthus
abilities: This weapon's strength is equal to your current insanity.
At the end of the showdown, you die.
You settlement's death count is added to this weapon's strength.
When you activate this, gain 1 bleeding token. X = your bleeding tokens minus 2.

Banshee Loincloth.crafting: x2 cloth, x1 perfect organ, x1 leather
abilities: {green_affinity}: Increase the effect of your [Banshee Dura] by 1 for every {red_affinity} {red_affinity} you have.
Do not gain {activation} or {movement} at the start of your act. You cannot spend survival.
{blue_puzzle}: When you suffer damage from [Current] X, gain a [Charged] token.
{red_affinity}, x2 {blue_affinity}, {activation}, {movement}: If you have a metal weapon in your gear grid, gain a [Charged] token.

Screaming Oni Mask.crafting: x1 spiral horn, x1 skull, x1 perfect bone
abilities: {activation}: Non-deaf knocked down survivors suffer {star} brain damage and stand. Limit once per round.

Gloom Cowl.crafting: x1 dark water, x1 leather, x1 scrap OR x1 perfect organ, x1 leather, x1 scrap
abilities: Your attacks gain +2 accuracy when attacking a monster you are adjacent to.
You must [Investigate] if a choice to investigate arises. When you would roll to investigate, pick any result. If you are a returning survivor, your retire.
{red_puzzle}, x2 {red_affinity}:When you [Sideswipe], gain +1 accuracy and +5 strength for next attack this turn.
{blue_affinity}, {green_affinity}: Ignore the first severe injury you suffer each showdown.
When you suffer the [Bleeding] or [Bloody Thighs] severe leg injuries, you instead gain 1 bleeding token.
x2 {red_puzzle}, {blue_puzzle}: [Unwieldy], [Range] 5 - After moving from a dash, the coat attacks with the following profile (4, 9+, 8) and ignores your attribute modifiers.
When you are encouraged, gain +1 insanity if your settlement is Barbaric or +1 survival if your settlement is Romantic.
